segments.text: What do you plan to do for your birthday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to have a picnic with my friends , Mum .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about a party at home ? That way we can get together and celebrate it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , Mum . I'll invite my friends home .
segments.speaker: S2
